code: import{createStore}from'redux';const initialState={sidebarShow:true};const changeState=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;let{type,...rest}=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(type){case'set':return{...state,...rest};default:return state;}};const store=createStore(changeState);export default store;
